name: hippole.com
description:
# educational games 100% no baseball hat made for epic education 100% ## list of games - [x] Cookie Clicker - [x] A whole list of Game Boy Advance games - [x] 2048 - [x] Tetris - [x] Wordle Unlimited - [ ] Nothing here, Be the first to suggest - [ ] Nothing here, Be the first to suggest - [ ] Nothing here, Be the first to suggest - [ ] Nothing here, Be the first to suggest ## hosting fork this project and then either host it with a different provider or host with github pages
for github pages just like go to settings then pages and whatever ## contributing ha ha ha **no**
ok maybe ## credits cookie clicker was taken from [Cookie Clicker](https://orteil.dashnet.org/cookieclicker/)'s source code (original author: Orteil)
gba emulator was taken from [browncha023's github](https://github.com/Browncha023/GBA) (made very minor decoration changes)
2048 was taken from [Gabriele Cirulli's github](https://github.com/gabrielecirulli/2048), 2048 AI taken from [ovolve's github](https://github.com/ovolve/2048-AI)
tetris was taken from [sandywalker's github](https://github.com/sandywalker/Tetris) (made very small decoration changes)
wordle was taken from [wordleunlimited.org](https://wordleunlimited.org/)
